name: Marathon Management System
description: A full-stack web app to create, explore, and register for marathons. Features include countdown, role-based dashboard, search/sort integration.
challenges: Handling dynamic registration period with countdown.
futurePlans: Add downloadable certificates, email notifications, and race result tracking.
mainFeatures: User registration and login with JWT

name: HobbyHub
description: A hobby group organizer platform that allows users to create, join, and manage hobby groups with secure authentication.
challenges: Controlling private group joining, maintaining user/group relation, and secure access.
futurePlans: Add group chat, calendar sync, and group event planning tools.
mainFeatures: Group details with description and members

name: Event Explorer
description: An event listing and discovery platform where users can browse, search, and view details of various local events.
challenges: Handling real-time search/sort logic and event filtering based on category and date.
futurePlans: Add bookmarking, user feedback/review system, and shareable event posters.
mainFeatures: Search events by title or location
User login and event feedback system
